method: Sweat the leeks in the butter until soft. Add the garlic and cook for another 5 minutes Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl. Check for seasoning.  Shape into balls, cover with cling film and chill for 30 minutes. Preheat the oil in a frying pan and cook the balls until browned and serve with a green salad
ingredients: 1 leek, finely sliced,  1 garlic clove, crushed,  butter, for sweating,  140g/5oz cheddar cheese, grated,  140g/5oz fresh white breadcrumbs,  2 tbsp finely chopped parsley,  Â½ tsp English mustard powder,  1 egg, beaten,  oil, for frying,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
